00055     function PrintInterfaceSelectForm()
00056     {
00057         global $ADMIN;
00059         if (in_array($_SESSION['USER'], $ADMIN)) {
00060             ?>
00061             <table id="ifselect">
00062                 <tr>
00063                     <td class="title">
00064                         <?php echo _TITLE2('Interfaces').':' ?>
00065                     </td>
00066                     <td>
00067                         <?php
00068                         $this->InterfaceSelectForm();
00069                         ?>
00070                     </td>
00071                     <td class="help">
00072                         <?php PrintHelpBox(_HELPBOX2('Here you should select the interface(s) the IDS listens to. Instance with the selected interface is restarted if it is already running.')) ?>
00073                     </td>
00074                 </tr>
00075             </table>
00076             <?php
00077         }
00078     }
00079 
00082     function InterfaceSelectForm()
00083     {
00084         global $Modules;
00085 
00086         $startconfirm= _NOTICE('Are you sure you want to start the <NAME>?');
00087         $startconfirm= preg_replace('/<NAME>/', _($Modules[$this->Model]['Name']), $startconfirm);
00088 
00089         $stopconfirm= _NOTICE('Are you sure you want to stop the <NAME>?');
00090         $stopconfirm= preg_replace('/<NAME>/', _($Modules[$this->Model]['Name']), $stopconfirm);
00091         ?>
00092         <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00093             <select name="Interfaces[]" multiple style="width: 100px; height: 50px;">
00094             <?php
00095             if ($this->Controller($output, 'GetPhyIfs')) {
00096                 foreach ($output as $if) {
00097                     ?>
00098                     <option value="<?php echo $if ?>"><?php echo $if ?></option>
00099                     <?php
00100                 }
00101             }
00102             ?>
00103             </select>
00104             <br />
00105             <input type="submit" name="Start" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Start') ?>" onclick="return confirm('<?php echo $startconfirm ?>')"/>
00106             <input type="submit" name="Stop" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Stop') ?>" onclick="return confirm('<?php echo $stopconfirm ?>')"/>
00107         </form>
00108         <?php
00109     }
00110 }
